title: Avacado 🥑 Carrot 🥕 Zucchini Salad | With Mint 🍃 Dressing | Healthy Diet | Summer Treat ☀️
content:
Salad recipe: Avacado carrot 🥕 zucchini salad  Servings: 4 Duration: 10 mins Today, I'm sharing Avacado salad with homemade mint dressing. It is so easy and quick to make salad, you can prepare anytime at home but I prefer to have Salad either at morning/ evening ☀️ In this salad, I added ripped Avacado, Cucumber, yellow  zucchini , freshly grated carrot and chopped cilantro and finally topped with mint dressing 🍃. Salad is so refreshing, healthy, clean & clear salad Click this link to know the health benefits of Avacado 🥑 Mint dressing is so flavored and pure aroma of freshly blended mint-ginger-garlic with spices, it turned out so creamy in texture and delicious too. I hope you like it Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Avacado - Ripped - 1 - chopped
  • Carrot - 1/2 - grated
  • Yellow zucchini - diced - peeled off
  • Cucumber - 2 mini - peeled off - diced
  • White onion - 2 tb sp - chopped
  • Cilantro - 1/4 cup
Mint Dressing:
  • Mint leaves - 30
  • Cashew nuts - 4
  • Almonds - 4
  • Salt -  1 tsp
  • Cumin powder - 1 tsp
  • Black Pepper powder  - 1 tsp
  • Olive oil - 1/2 tsp
  • Ginger - 6 pieces - small
  • Garlic cloves - 2 peeled off & chopped
  • Honey - 1 tb sp
  • Lemon juice - 1 1/2 tb sp
  • Water - 80 ml
Procedure:
  • Add all chopped veggies in a mixing bowl
  • Next add all mint dressing ingredients in blender
  • Blend it into fine paste
  • Add this paste in mixing bowl & mix well
  • Salad is ready to serve
  • Happy cooking 👩🏻‍🍳 & enjoy your day ☀️
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust salt & lemon juice  according to taste
  • You can skip ginger or garlic in dressing
  • Veggies you can add as per your choice
  • Instead of white onion, you can also add red onion
